item.title: Markdown Formatting Demo
item.description: This example Markdown file compliments of markdown-it.github.io h1 Heading 8-) h2 Heading h3 Heading h4 Heading h5 Heading h6 Heading Horizontal Rules Typographic replacements Enable typographer option to see result. (c) (C) (r) (R) (tm) (TM) (p) (P) +- test.. test… test….. test?….. test!…. !!!!!! ???? ,, – — “Smartypants, double quotes” and ‘single quotes’ Emphasis This is bold text This is bold text This is italic text

item.title: Rotem and The Elephant
item.description: Rotem & The Elephent haven’t sold much, but it has a did get help us recruit the biggest publisher for Libby’s next book “On Smith Street”. Ideal for toddlers we still a few copy left and we’re selling them at our store.
